plot: Manuel is in a new town, in a new school and has people around him with a different language. It's not easy for him to settle in, till he meets another boy from his class.
title: Le nouveua
plot_es: Manuel is in a new town, in a new school and has people around him with a different language. It's not easy for him to settle in, till he meets another boy from his class.
plot_en: Manuel is in a new town, in a new school and has people around him with a different language. It's not easy for him to settle in, till he meets another boy from his class.
